name: Supper Break Brick 3D
description:
Supper Break Brick 3D is a lovely game created based on classic arcade game – brick breaker! Similar game play and different gaming feelings! Various power-ups and special effects! Enjoy yourself in the brick world!
Features of Game:
- Many levels and speed
- Use ping pong to break brick easy
- Carefully recreated classic Brick Games
- Familiar controls that was transferred to the touchscreen
